IV.value: Red/Green/Blue vertical stripes (whether or not these stripes are continuous across the vertical dimension of the display screen).
Red/Green/Blue horizontal stripes (whether or not these stripes are continuous across the horizontal dimension of the display screen).
Vertical stripes (as in 1), with the primary ordering given by the order of the chromaticity information in the base EDID.
Horizontal stripes (as in 2), with the primary ordering given by the order of the chromaticity information in the base EDID.
Quad subpixels; a 2 x 2 structure with a red subpixel at top left, a blue subpixel at bottom right, and the remaining two subpixels green.
As in 5, but with red at bottom left and blue at top right.
Quad subpixels; a 2 x 2 subpixel structure including one each of red, green, blue, and one additional color, including white, in any order.
Five subpixels, including RGB subpixels aligned as in the case of 01h, with two additional subpixels located above or below this group.
Six subpixels; as in case of 10, but with three additional colors in addition to the base set.
Clairvoyante, Inc. PenTile Matrixâ„¢ layout2 (see drawing in Appendix A) .
